titleStmt.title: Christian chymistrie extracting the honey of instruction from variety of objects. Being an handfull of observations historicall, occasionall, and out of scripture. With applications theologicall and morall. By Caleb Trenchfield, sometime minister of the church at Chipsted in Surrey.
titleStmt.author: Trenchfield, Caleb, 1624 or 5-1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by M.S. for H. Crips, at his shop in Popes-head Alley next Lombard Street,

notesStmt.note: With caption titles on pp. 1, 113, and 159: Christian chymistrie; Occasional observations; Scripture observations.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Popes-head Alley next Lombard Street
